workflow_description: Phase 1: Navigate to homepage and verify Yahoo Finance logo and Market Summary banner. Click 'News' and 'Markets' links. Phase 2: Search for 'AAPL' and verify Apple Inc. page. Search for 'Microsoft' and check suggestion. Enter invalid 'XYZ123QQ' and verify error. Phase 3: On AAPL page, verify price, statistics tab, profile (sector/description), and financials (Income Statement). Phase 4: Toggle chart periods (1D, 5D). Phase 5: Check Historical Data tab. Phase 7: Visit Screeners and verify 'Undervalued Growth Stocks' list. Play a video in news section.
